Apple___Apple_scab.symptoms: Dark, olive-green to brown spots on leaves and fruit
Apple___Apple_scab.treatment: Apply fungicides, remove infected leaves, improve air circulation
Apple___Apple_scab.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, maintain tree health, proper spacing

Apple___Black_rot.symptoms: Black, sunken lesions on fruit and leaves
Apple___Black_rot.treatment: Remove infected parts, apply fungicides, sanitize tools
Apple___Black_rot.prevention: Prune properly, avoid overhead irrigation, clean orchard floor

Apple___healthy.prevention: Maintain good cultural practices, regular monitoring

Tomato___Late_blight.symptoms: Dark, water-soaked lesions on leaves and stems
Tomato___Late_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides immediately, remove infected plants
Tomato___Late_blight.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, avoid overhead irrigation

Tomato___healthy.prevention: Maintain good cultural practices, regular monitoring
